trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Espone <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> tipi [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento associato a questo peer di automazione.

trans-unit.source: Minimizes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Riduce al minimo il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'elemento specificato.

trans-unit.source: An object that is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che è il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"></xref> that is associated with the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"> </xref> associato all'elemento specificato.

trans-unit.source: Restores the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ripristina il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato espanso o compresso, del controllo associato a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The state of the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato del controllo associato a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> valore di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di elementi figlio del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: The GetChildrenCore method returns a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> objects that represent the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> objects that belong to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetChildrenCore restituisce una raccolta di <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>gli oggetti che rappresentano il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab>gli oggetti che appartengono a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi figlio del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: The type name of the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del tipo dell'oggetto associato <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> che è associato il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Enumerazione un valore che specifica il pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: If the property of the is and patternInterface is the , , , or value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se il proprietà del è e patternInterface è il , , , o valore, questo metodo restituisce un oggetto che supporta il pattern di controllo; in caso contrario, .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"> </xref> è fuori dallo schermo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> is collapsed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> compresso; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Questa API non è implementata.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che specifica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> consente più di un elemento figlio da selezionare contemporaneamente.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un'implementazione esplicita dell'interfaccia di un membro.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: E può essere utilizzato solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer>esegue il cast dell'istanza di un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>interfaccia.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> requires at least one child element to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che specifica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref> richiede di selezionare almeno un elemento figlio.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
